name: Cosmic Grim Reaper Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Take no damage for the first turn of battle and gain +50% Fury if you are attacked on the first turn of battle
Deal additional random damage to a random enemy equal to 50% of their MISSING HP every action
Gain Endure and Heal Shield for 3 turns when your HP reaches 1 the first time in battle.This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to the Grim Reaper Eddie character.
